column3: Faculty of Business and Social Sciences
column5: This new course has been designed to prepare graduates and professionals with the skills needed to launch a career in FinTech or the financial services sector.You will develop in-demand analytical and programming skills alongside a thorough understanding of key trends in financial technology such as blockchain, cryptocurrency and machine learning. With access to real-time financial data via our dedicated Bloomberg Trading Room, you will be taught by academics actively researching the FinTech sector along with industry experts to ensure your skills are at the forefront of this exciting sector.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 2 years full time including a professional placement
